Articles.Content:
Every few tries I get an error report.

It says something like "Error 502: Bad gateway"

Is anyone else getting this? What is causing it?
I just had a bad gateway error from aprox 1121 AEST to 1135 AEST.

Squad pls

why

I had to go *outside* because of you

pls fix
I also had a 502 Bad Gateway. It lasted for almost 90 minutes ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Yeah, it looks like forums were down for several minutes?

> 
> Every few tries I get an error report.
> It says something like "Error 502: Bad gateway"
> 
> Is anyone else getting this? What is causing it?

It's a general problem with communication. Their servers are having some issues.
I've had this for the past 2 hours.
I had the problem for about 2 hours as well. Forums just went back online for me right now.
I think its because of the server load from 1.0

> 
> I think its because of the server load from 1.0

I am assuming this is so. I was checking the vBulletin forums about the 502 Error and it is due to large loads over an extended period of time. This makes sense since we have been seeing a large increase of both guests and members since 1.0 was released.

Yeah, I've had it intermittently for the past 12 hours or so, and all the time for well over an hour.

EDIT: I also had the same thing trying to update my profile on KerbalStuff

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T02:37:33Z" title="05/04/2015 02:37  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by TheMoonRover**

Hello,

Yep same here I thought my modem was bad...all day yesterday off and on...they could have had DOS attacks who knows lets hope they look into that avenue.

Cmdr Zeta

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T12:17:36Z" title="05/04/2015 12:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by Cdr\_Zeta**
